Getting Here

The main entrance of the Child Study Center is located at 230 South Frontage Road, New Haven, CT, 06511, between York and College streets.

Parking

If this is a weekend visit, you will be parking in front of the Child Study Center (free weekend parking). As you travel down South Frontage, a one-way street, the Center is on your right. Call us so we may let you in the lot; otherwise weâ€™ll be waiting there to let you in when you arrive. If you find that someone is not there to greet you in the lobby, ask for Michael Crowley.

If this is a weekday visit, you may park in the Air Rights Garage (see map). Parking lot entrance points are marked on the map.


View Larger Google Map

Driving directions

  • From I-95 North or South

    I-95 traveling north or south Exit 47 to Route 34 west to Exit 2 or 3.

  • From I-91 South

    I-91 traveling south Exit 1 to Route 34 west to Exit 2 or 3.

  • Wilbur Cross Parkway (Rte. 15) traveling south

    Exit 59 immediately after tunnel. Right at end of ramp. Merge left onto Whalley Avenue at light. Stay on Whalley until you see signs for Yale-New Haven at Park Street. Follow hospital signs, then make a left turn onto South Frontage Road.

  • Merritt Parkway (Rte. 15) traveling north

    Exit 57 to Route 34 east into New Haven. Right onto Ella T. Grasso Boulevard (Rte. 10) and left onto South Frontage Road (Legion Ave.). Follow hospital and Rte. 34 signs. Covered entrance at 20 York Street.

  • Route 1 (Boston Post Road) traveling east

    After crossing Ella T. Grasso Boulevard (Rte. 10), turn left onto Davenport Avenue. When Davenport crosses Howard Avenue, it becomes York Street.
